title: Seikon no Qwaser
alternative_title: The Qwaser of Stigmata, 聖痕のクェイサー
description: n St. Mikhailov Academy, Oribe Mafuyu meets a silver haired boy called Alexander. He is a Qwaser, a being who can manipulate iron and draws his power from breast milk. A mystery surrounding an icon tranforms the academy into a setting for conflict between the various Qwasers
genre: [<Genre -> Action>, <Genre -> Ecchi>, <Genre -> Shounen>, <Genre -> Super Power>, <Genre -> Supernatural>]
